content.tittle: Hello, my name is Maria Clara Amorim
content.sobre: - I'm a frontend web developer, I work with JavaScript, ReactJS, TypeScript and PHP. Graduated in IT technician from the Federal Institute of Bahia (IFBA). Currently studying the Physiotherapy course at UNIPLAN. I work developing applications for companies (e-commerce, tickets, library, etc.)
portfolio.descricao1: These are some of the public commercial projects I have worked on
portfolio.descricao2: These are some of my favorite personal projects I've worked on
portfolio.dantas: This is a complete e-commerce website for selling bicycles and bicycle accessories. Developed by me and a team of frontend and backend developers
footer: All Rights Reserved. Made by Maria Clara Amorim
